Everything you need for crypto payments

Powerful features designed to make crypto as easy as cash.

Non‑custodial wallet: You control your keys.

QR payments: Scan to send/receive.

LINE integration: Pay your contacts.

Low fees: Fast, affordable transfers.

Instant settlements: Real-time processing.

Multi-currency support: Global payments.

24/7 availability: Always accessible.
